QueryResult.text: SELECT UG.USER_ID, AP.OBJECT_ID, AP.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PE.PERMISSION_CODE, PE.PERMISSION_VALUE, AP.ID ID, PE.ID PE_ID, UG.ID UG_ID FROM CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE, CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM AP, CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS H, CMN_SEC_GROUPS G, CMN_SEC_GROUPS PARENT_GROUP, CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS UG WHERE UG.GROUP_ID = H.GROUP_ID AND H.GROUP_ID = G.ID AND G.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND PARENT_GROUP.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND PARENT_GROUP.ID = H.PARENT_GROUP_ID AND AP.PRINCIPAL_ID = H.PARENT_GROUP_ID AND AP.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'GROUP' AND AP.PERMISSION_ID = PE.PERMISSION_ID
